Infectra: Okay, umm....which one??? *Infectra says to Airbomber*
  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Th=
ursday, July 06, 2000 7:56 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "Well, you =
shall be amazed at how much Liono screwed up the future, but you should go =
and get aquainted with some of the other bots." Airbomber said to Infectra.=
..
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:43 PM
    Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


    *Infectra nodded and looked around* Infectra: What sh=
ould I expect to happen or find out here? *Infectra says to The Radicons*
 =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:49 AM
      Subject: Re: N=
eo Beast Wars


      "Give them a chance, I'm sure they'll like you." Airb=
omber whispered back to Infectra...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
       From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent:=
 Thursday, July 06, 2000 3:23 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    =
    *Infectra smiles waves to any bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I don't =
think they like me. *Infectra whispers to Airbomber*
          ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
          Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 11:47 PM
          Subject: Re: =
Neo Beast Wars


          "Sure, we'll tell ya." Airbomber said, making su=
re nobody was aiming their blaster's at Infectra.

          "Hey, everyone=
! This is Infectra! She's with us!" Airbomber said. Plintissa growled.

   =
       "These Radicons fired at me, Artist, and Dracona when we tried to he=
lp them and ran away! I don't think they could be trusted!" Plintissa said.=


          "We have our gestalt form and we're useful and powerful." Stran=
ato said. Plintissa walked away angrily...
            ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 7:12 PM
            Subject:=
 Re: Neo Beast Wars


            *Infectra nods and follows the Radicons* =
Infectra: How can you tell if one is not to be trusted? *Infectra says to t=
he Radicons*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From=
: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Tuesda=
y, July 04, 2000 5:36 PM
              Subject: Neo Beast Wars


          =
    Sinesis and Sinister both kept poking each other, but saying nothing wh=
en the other looked. They both grabbed their swords and were about to stab =
each other, but they put the swords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

   =
           Plintissa and Dracona decided to follow Artist and they walked o=
ff to the Ark. Once there, they entered the base.

              "Hey, have=
 any of you seen a bot come by here just staring?" Plintissa asked. Dracona=
 started to look around in logical places a lunatic might hide.

          =
    Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting around and drinking tea and they=
 left again.

              "Who shall we join with, dear?" Inzola asked.

=
              "Whomever wants out assistance." Deemos replies. They walk on=
 until they see the Alliance base.

              "This one looks good, let=
s go and ask them if they have any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and De=
emos walked up to the base.

              "Ahem, excuse us, but we're look=
ing to join your fine team, we have been looking for a faction to join, and=
 it appears that it is you who will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we=
 wish to join you, what fo we have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something=
 reasonable, please, no killing a bot things or anything.)

              G=
angon had a nightmare, He was again tied to the magical chair when Sinister=
 and Sinesis came up to him. Then BrightBlade did, and then Dracona. They a=
ll pulled of their masks and were 2 headed, one head Inzola, and the other =
head Deemos. Gangon screamed and held hbis head in pain. Gangon woke up, an=
d remembered that he couldn't move. He considered that thing about getting =
a replacement body, how it would be a good idea just in case he had to get =
out of this dump, which was probable if he wanted to kill himself. He waite=
d for Plintissa and Dracona to come back.

              The Radicons looke=
d at Infectra.

              "Now, all you need to do is follow us, we hav=
e set you on friend of the Maximals, I'm sure they won't mind, seeing as ho=
w you would make a great addition to their group." Airbomber said. They wal=
ked inside of the Maximal base, waiting for Infectra to follow.

          =
    Artist walked around the war room in circles, not quite knowing where h=
e was going.

-------------------------------------------------------------=
-----------------
